nodes.text: The title of Chairman was given to the permanent or long-term president of a company, committee or other organization. It was notably the highest rank one could obtain in the InterGalactic Banking Clan. During the time of the Clone Wars, this position was held by San Hill and had previously been held by a member of the Tonith family.

Chairman was also the title used by the Head of State of Utapau, as leader of the Utapaun Committee. Chi Cho, the elected head of the of the moon of Pantora's government (The Pantoran Assembly), was also addressed as Chairman.
Chairman was also the title of the leader of the Vorzydiaks on Vorzyd IV, which was Port during Qui-Gon Jinn and Obi Wan Kenobi's mission in 39 BBY.
Lando Calrissian was also called Chairman by Columi brothers Marvid and Craitheus Qrephs at one point when he owned Sarnus Refinery in 45 ABY.
